name: Rendering experiment v1
description:
First experiment on a kind of unconventional rendering.

This kind of rendering consists in layering the character, and each layer will move and rotate relatively to the upper layer, with a bigger delay deeper down the layers.

The advantage in this kind of rendering (other than looking cool) is a reduced amount of assets needed for animations, but what I found to be a big turn off was that I couldn't think of a simple way to render moving legs.
